question: Which military unit has been honoured with  President’s Colour award?
explanation: President Ram Nath Kovind presented the prestigious President’s Colour, to the Indian Naval Academy at Ezhimala, Kerala.  It is recognition of the yeoman service rendered by the institution in training and shaping Indian Naval officers over the last 50 years at three different locations - Kochi, Goa and Ezhimala. The President’s Colour is the highest honour that is bestowed upon a military unit.
